translations.translation: The day all secrets are examined
On the Day when man's deepest secrets shall be put to the test
On the day when all secrets will be made public,
A day when the secrets will be examined.
The Day when all the secrets will be examined.
On the day when hidden things shall be made manifest,
upon the day when the secrets are tried,
On the day when hidden thoughts shall be searched out.
On the Day when secrets are disclosed,
On a Day whereon secrets shall be out.
on the day when the secrets are examined
The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,
The Day when all the secrets (deeds, prayers, fasting, etc.) will be examined (as to their truth).
on the Day when consciences are examined,
On the Day when the secrets are disclosed.
The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
[86:9] on the day when [all] secrets, the hidden convictions and intentions of the hearts, are inspected, [when] they are examined and revealed,
(On the day when hidden thoughts shall be searched out) when all the secrets that a person knows, and no one else other than him knows, become manifest.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { يَوْمَ تُبْلَىٰ ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ } معناه تُختَبرُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: تأملوا أيها المجبولون على فطرة العبرة والتكليف { يَوْمَ تُبْلَىٰ ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ } [الطارق: 9] وتكشف الساتر، ويظهر ما خفي في الضمائر من الإنكار والإصرار، وفواسد النيات والأعمال
